Interface Q030SubstringWithConcatenationOfAllWords

All Known Implementing Classes:
Q030SubstringWithConcatenationOfAllWordsImpl
public interface Q030SubstringWithConcatenationOfAllWords

Q030 Substring With Concatenation Of All Words

Copyright 2013 LeetCode

You are given a string, S, and a list of words, L, that are all of the same length. Find all starting indices of substring(s) in S that is a concatenation of each word in L exactly once and without any intervening characters. 

 For example, given:
 S: "barfoothefoobarman"
 L: ["foo", "bar"]

 You should return the indices: [0,9].
 (order does not matter).

http://discuss.leetcode.com/questions/210/substring-with-concatenation-of-all-words http://n00tc0d3r.blogspot.com/2013/06/substring-with-concatenation-of-all.html http://blog.csdn.net/fightforyourdream/article/details/14165397

See Also:
A blog from UniEagle, A blog from gongxun
